articles.title: Xiaomi may be developing smart glasses capable of phototherapy, says report - India Today

articles.content: Xiaomi has just lately filed a brand new patent that implies that the model will be making its smart glasses within the near future. The new glasses will be capable of several new features apart from… [+1968 chars]
